page.title: 04Wetwang,Living on a farm.
page.content: Living on a farm out side the village is quiet isolated especially in winter.Also it is hard to get out to the shops so we have to stock up with food in case we get snowed in.It's always busy on a farm especially in harvest when there are lots of tractors about the farm.Living on a farm has it's advantages because you can keep more pets on a farm because there is more room but it also has it's disadvantages because you have to travel a long way to the nearest village.I don't think I could ever live in a village or town because of the traffic and the noise . It's not that noisy on a farm. I like living on a farm because it's fairly quiet and there is lot's of room to go for a walk,ride my bike,make a den in the straw stack and take my dog for a walk.
